title: California just abolished its longstanding ban on electric skateboards
text:
California just abolished its longstanding ban on electric skateboards 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
On Sunday, California Governor Jerry Brown signed Assembly Bill 604, officially granting electric skateboards the right to go anywhere bikes... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
